title: Our Practice
subtitle: Our modern practice for aesthetic and cosmetic treatments is located in the middle of Berlin City (West). The outpatient treatments are carried out by Prof. Dr. Nidal Toman and his team on their own premises. You will feel comfortable with us!

content.subtitle1: We look forward to welcoming you to our practice.
content.subtitle2: Take a seat in our open waiting area.
content.subtitle3: Let Prof. Dr. Nidal Toman advised in detail.
content.subtitle4: We can carry out outpatient treatments directly in our treatment room.
content.subtitle6: Enjoy some fresh air on our heated outdoor terrace.
